Text: This had to be alot of work! Thanks man, great job!
Guys plz make an effort and seed it for a while, I am only getting 1kb/s :(((
Thanks a lot UL! I love WFRP and have bought almost every book. But i like to have them in PDF. If u like WFRP buy the books and keep the world alive.
IÂ´m looking for Children of the Horned Rat so if anyone has that lying around please upload it.

in case u don't know bout it

Wow, this is great stuff man, well done!
Does anyone know of a GM Pack in PDF somewhere? They are all sold out at the moment and I'm running a campaign very soon...

An even bigger WFRP-book kit is availible here: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3956522/Warhammer_FRP_collection

I've got all the books, but having them in digital form as a quick reference is really nice! =)
( GM Pack is in there aswell! =) )

Guys, you may want to know that FFG have released legal .pdf's for sale (http://www.fantasyflightgames.com/edge_news.asp?eidn=615). 

It's $25 per rulebook and $15 per supplement. 

One major thing is that the they _incorporate the official errata_. 

A must buy:

http://www.rpgnow.com/index.php?cPath=4943

More books are coming soon.
